name: A normal Tycoon DEMO
description:
Hello welcome to a normal tycoon Demo version

The full game will be free

A different name will come soon!

Made in construct 2!

Story: (work in progress)

Your a homeless man and then you found a random guy that helped you make a lemonade stand

and a drink of lemonade is 2$ but you pay 1$ to the random guy that helped you so you get 1$

and you can buy stuff to get more people and more money

Game jolt Version (Has achievements but also a bit buggy): https://gamejolt.com/games/a-normal-tycoon/595935

I recommend going in full screen!
